Description:
Qualifications   Education and Certifications:ALA-accredited or equivalent Master's degree in Library and Information Science. Experience:Minimum 5 years of relevant experience, with 2 years of supervisory and 2 years of cataloguing experience. Language:Fluency in written and spoken English language is required.Fluency in written and spoken Arabic language is preferred. Other Required Skills Self-Development, Concern for Order and Quality, Reliability and Dependability, Relationship Building and Time Management with technical competencies in Library and Information Science and Process Design and Efficiency are required. How to Apply:  Applications should be submitted via our online application portal by clicking the “Apply now” button below.Collaborative and collegial spirit and a demonstrated ability to establish rapport with learners, colleagues, sponsor-employers, and members of the community.
Experience in leadership and innovation in technology-based projects.Applicants must meet all essential qualifications in order to be shortlisted for the position; other qualifications may be a deciding factor in selection.
